title: Oracle's Chamber Adventure #60
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Divination Hall
rooms.description: A grand circular hall with polished marble floors reflecting the light of countless candles. Mystical symbols are inlaid in silver across the walls, and the ceiling depicts a star map of constellations. The air shimmers with latent magical energy. Silk curtains in deep purple hang between ornate pillars, and the scent of jasmine and myrrh fills the space.

items.name: ceremonial table
items.description: A round table made of dark wood, covered with divination tools and ritual objects

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A brass key engraved with mystical runes and star patterns

items.name: offering cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three compartments where seekers leave gifts for the Oracle

items.name: seeker's scroll
items.description: A scroll left by a previous visitor to the Oracle
items.text: I have traveled far to consult the Oracle Pythia. They say she uses a Crystal Sphere to see beyond the veil of time. The sacred number is 888 - eight for infinity, repeated thrice for past, present, and future. May my questions be answered.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A delicate silver key with a crescent moon design

items.name: bronze incense brazier
items.description: A large brazier burning fragrant incense, smoke curling upward in mystical patterns
items.text: The smoke forms fleeting images: a woman in flowing robes holding a glowing sphere, ancient scrolls being carefully stored in an archive, and a doorway opening to reveal brilliant light.

items.name: ornate locked chest
items.description: A chest decorated with mother-of-pearl inlays depicting prophetic visions

items.name: history of the Oracle
items.description: A leather-bound tome detailing the Oracle's lineage
items.text: The Oracle Pythia has served as the voice of prophecy for generations. She gazes into her sacred Crystal Sphere to perceive visions of what was, what is, and what may be. All prophecies are carefully recorded and preserved in the Prophecy Archive for future generations.

items.name: glowing crystal shard
items.description: A fragment of crystal that pulses with inner light, warm to the touch

items.name: purple silk curtains
items.description: Luxurious curtains embroidered with golden thread forming mystical patterns

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A small note tucked behind the curtains
items.text: Reminder to acolytes: The Oracle Pythia requires absolute silence during her visions. Her Crystal Sphere must be kept polished and pure. All prophecies must be transcribed immediately and stored in the Prophecy Archive.

items.name: archive door
items.description: A heavy wooden door carved with images of scrolls and books, leading to the Prophecy Archive

rooms.name: Prophecy Archive
rooms.description: A vast library chamber with floor-to-ceiling shelves filled with scrolls, tablets, and bound volumes. Each contains recorded prophecies spanning centuries. Soft golden light emanates from enchanted lanterns floating near the ceiling. The air is dry and smells of ancient parchment and leather. A magnificent door adorned with celestial symbols stands at the far end.

items.name: archivist's desk
items.description: A large desk covered with open scrolls, quills, and ink bottles

items.name: archivist's journal
items.description: A journal kept by the keeper of the archive
items.text: Day 1,247: Another prophecy from Oracle Pythia recorded today. She gazed into her Crystal Sphere and spoke of events yet to come. I have carefully transcribed her words and placed them in the archive. Only those who understand the Oracle's methods may enter her sanctum.

items.name: ancient prophecy shelf
items.description: A shelf containing the oldest recorded prophecies
items.text: Shelf label: 'Ancient Prophecies - Recorded by Oracle Pythia through visions seen in the Crystal Sphere. These sacred texts are preserved in the Prophecy Archive for all time.'

items.name: recent prophecy shelf
items.description: A shelf with more recent prophecies and visions
items.text: Recent entries detail visions of travelers seeking wisdom, kingdoms rising and falling, and the eternal cycle of fate. Each vision was perceived through the Oracle's sacred Crystal Sphere.

items.name: inscribed stone tablet
items.description: An ancient tablet mounted on the wall
items.text: Inscription: 'Let it be known that Oracle Pythia, blessed with the gift of sight, serves as the bridge between mortal and divine. Her visions, revealed through the Crystal Sphere, are recorded here in the Prophecy Archive, that wisdom may endure through the ages.'

items.name: scroll storage cabinet
items.description: A cabinet with multiple compartments for organizing prophecies

items.name: vision record scroll
items.description: A scroll documenting a particularly significant prophecy
items.text: Vision Record: Oracle Pythia held the Crystal Sphere and spoke: 'Three truths unlock the path to wisdom. Know the seer's name, know her sacred tool, know where knowledge is preserved.' This prophecy was recorded in the Prophecy Archive on the day of the triple eclipse.

items.name: ceremonial silk cloth
items.description: A cloth used to wrap the Oracle's sacred tools

items.name: reading lectern
items.description: A tall lectern with an open book of prophecies
items.text: The open page reads: 'The Oracle's Sanctum awaits those who prove their understanding. Speak the name of the seer, name her instrument of vision, and declare where prophecies are kept. Only then shall the way be opened.'

items.name: sanctum door
items.description: A magnificent door carved with celestial symbols and constellations. Three questions are inscribed in glowing script across its surface.

password_questions.question: What is the Oracle's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the seeker's scroll, oracle history, and various records throughout the chambers

password_questions.question: What is the Oracle's sacred tool for visions?
password_questions.hint: Multiple texts mention the instrument the Oracle uses to see prophecies

password_questions.question: Where are prophecies recorded and preserved?
password_questions.hint: Look at the inscriptions and records describing where visions are stored

rooms.name: Oracle's Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the Oracle's inner sanctum! A breathtaking chamber with walls of polished crystal that reflect and refract light into rainbow patterns. In the center, upon a pedestal of white marble, rests a magnificent Crystal Sphere glowing with inner radiance. The Oracle herself appears as a luminous figure, her form shimmering with otherworldly light. She gestures toward an archway filled with brilliant light - your path to freedom.

items.name: Oracle's Crystal Sphere
items.description: The legendary Crystal Sphere, pulsing with prophetic power and ancient magic

items.name: white marble pedestal
items.description: An elegant pedestal supporting the Crystal Sphere, carved with intricate prophecies

items.name: Oracle Pythia
items.description: The ethereal form of Oracle Pythia, radiating wisdom and serenity
items.text: Oracle Pythia speaks in a voice like distant bells: 'You have proven yourself worthy by understanding the nature of prophecy and the keeper of visions. Your journey through my chambers has shown wisdom and perseverance. Go now, with my blessing, and carry the knowledge you have gained into the world.'

items.name: crystalline walls
items.description: Walls of pure crystal that seem to contain infinite reflections and possibilities

rooms.win_message: Oracle Pythia raises her hand in blessing as you approach the archway of light. 'You have navigated the mysteries of my chamber and proven your understanding,' she intones. 'May the wisdom you have gained serve you well.' You step through the radiant archway and emerge into the world beyond, forever changed by your encounter with the Oracle. You win!
